Posts.Content: Daisy10 Hi, first treatment out of the way, lots of information to take in but wasn't as bad as I thought it would be.  All the staff were really lovely. Booked to have a PICC line fitted before my next session. Fingers crossed the side effects aren't too bad if I get any. Hope you are feeling OK Gay xx  well done its the start. Mine soon.x
Posts.Title: * * * January 2017 breast cancer chemo club * * *

Posts.Content: Well done you .so happy for you. Ii am on my first chemo its throwing everything at me. So I guess I betteer throw it back. Good luck with the last leg of your journey. And heeres looking foward tto spring.x
